description:
PoseidonFX CEO and former forex broker Joshua Garrison teaches the fundamentals of forex trading in this 23 lecture video course. This class is perfect for the absolute beginner to currency trading - teaching everything you absolutely need to know, and nothing you don't.

If you're tired of endless internet articles on outdated trading techniques, this is definitely the class for you! In this class you will learn:

  • Terms and Definitions
  • Basics of Using MetaTrader4
  • Basics of Fundamental Analysis
  • Basics of Technical Analysis

This is an excellent, comprehensive overview of all the skills and tools an absolute novice to forex trading needs to get started in the market.
title: Fundamentals of Forex Trading
